overview: Horse breeders Adams and Brock are vying for the Army contract. When Adams is killed trying to ride his horse Trigger, Roy saves the horse from being shot. He trains him and then plans to ride him in the race to win the contract.
tagline: The screen's brighest star shines brilliantly in the most sparkling, song-filled, action-packed production of his metoric career!
title: Hands Across the Border
